website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for an out-of-the-way floating desk. Provides a good combination of surface space, built-in organization, and comfort all in one package.
pros: More organizational features and storage shelves than other options
Each shelf is wide enough to securely hold small objects
cons: Built-in keyboard tray can be difficult to pull out

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying my hubby and I are in our 50's and have assembled our share of stuff like this. This desk was by far the least problematic to put together as in all holes lined up and all hardware was there. The only reasons I won't give 5 stars are: The boards aren't indentified with stamps or stickers so it slows assembly down a bit. Partial board isn't 5 star worthy. The only issue is this spluge of something that won't come off without damaging the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rooms and Short and Tall people looking for a desk with leg room!
customer_reviews.text: This wall desk turned out great! My wife is a little short and desks and chairs have been too high so we tried this which solved everything we set it at the height we liked and it is great! The materials are well made enough and it's holding up well to a lot of use so far. They included screw covers so no shiny silver throwing off the look. It takes up little space so its a good buy for those who can't get a full desk into a small room. with a little bit of extra side shelving my wife has plenty of room to work now.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk. Looks great on the wall and it saves a lot of space if you have a small room. It took me about 2 hours to install and it went smooth. And the quality is very good. There is nothing I did not like about this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mircea C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect it saves space and is very durable, but the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because when we were putting it together a lot of time was wasted because the screws and things were just all thrown in the same bag together and we had to organize them on top of that they didn't mark any of the pieces of wood so we had to figure out what piece went where
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for children
customer_reviews.text: I love that I could customize the height of the work surface (by hanging according to my son's size) to make an appropriate ergonomic space for my child. This has been a great space for distance learning. Ample storage, and the desk surface is large enough for school work, as well as a computer monitor. Paired with a wobble seat, this has been a great investment. Then wall mounts are very secure when hung properly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Angelo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk so my 2nd grader can have her own space for e-learning without taking up too much floor space. So far so good. It wasn’t too difficult to assemble and feels sturdy on the wall. It does scratch easily, so have to be careful there. All in all, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gromkov

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice and it appears to be pretty good quality for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and it appears to be pretty good quality for the price. It does require a fair amount of assembly and the tray for the keyboard had the wholes on the wrong side so we had to drill into it but it turned out ok.
customer_reviews.author: Pao

customer_reviews.title: Thin not durable
customer_reviews.text: They wood is very thin and the rails for the keyboard holder is frail bump into it with the chair and it broke clean off now I have to find replacement pieces
customer_reviews.author: NaKeena

customer_reviews.title: Good Desk for the Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and intact. Looks good and quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: pamark1

customer_reviews.title: Like the design, went together easy....butt
customer_reviews.text: Great design, strongly secures to the wall, goes together very easy however, the veneer is over press wood and chips very easy...After a while, I have a feeling its going to look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat emptor

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I was able to put this together by myself in about 1.5 hours and able to hang it up by myself using their instruction guide!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this desk is not very sturdy! I looks nice but a poor design. It’s only been up for 3 months
customer_reviews.author: M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: HEX BIT?  FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me, you’ve put together your share of these kinds of diy projects. This is the best one I’ve found. I put it together and hung it in 2 hours. Yes, you’ve got to fix the hanging bracket to 3 studs. But once up, it’s SUPER solid. And finally a manufacturer that put a hex bit, not just an Allen wrench, in the package. Saves time and mucho aggravation! Everything went together smoothly. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: glenn r.

customer_reviews.title: on it right now, loved it since i installed it!
customer_reviews.text: on it right now, loved it since i installed it! fast delivery great price
customer_reviews.author: peter blount

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the wood is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wood is better than I expected, however, I gave it 4 stars because the pieces are not labeled and the instructions are not clear. It took about 3 hours to put together and hang. The instructions could have also been in an order that was more conducive in putting the desk together in a logical way. Overall, a very nice and sturdy desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, the laminate surrounding the particle wood easily chips and cracks. The edges of every piece of this desk is as sharp as steak knife! I got battle wounds during installation. Please don't buy this product if you are remotely clumsy or have kids that will be exposed to the area around it. That said, the only positive is that it'll save up room.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I really like this desk
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk. Good quality, good directions, it went together easily. Plus it’s a very attractive desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best with 2 people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. Easy for 2 people to assemble but would have taken a lot more time if only one person. The only issue we had was 2 parts were missing and we had to run to home depot or lowes... .
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise turned out great
customer_reviews.text: Missing spacers, but we improvised with stainless nuts we had at home. Otherwise turned out great
customer_reviews.author: ShayLee Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Put Together And Hang
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it for her desk top computer and some of her collectibles and for cleaning it is great being off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: You really need studs in the correct areas, we were able to make it work with a toggle bolt, getting it installed was the worse. Nothing came labeled on the wood so we have to look and see what went where.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Nice not having too move desk and junk to vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: matches my existing suspended wall unit for the TV. Nice not having too move desk and junk to vacuum behind. I think the hole to hide the wires could be larger, but that is because I have 2 computers set up on the desk so more wires.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I used it for a gaming rig in a tight space and its amazing. Took a bit of time to set up but once you get past the initial 1st steps its a breeze after that.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan obrien

customer_reviews.title: This desk is amazing, my office is extremely small and it's well ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing, my office is extremely small and it's well made. My office looks so much bigger now. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for a computer desk to be out the way
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk I highly recommend it to anyone looking to buy
customer_reviews.author: Amyra Lay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for my daughter and it takes up much less space than a normal desk
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have a small area and it helped freeing up floor space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this desk. Hold a lot more than what I thought. Very easy to assemble. took me less than 45 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: love sports

customer_reviews.title: still a pretty nice product with well designing desktop table
customer_reviews.text: even though there are many scratches on the surface when it arrived to my place, still a pretty nice product with well designing desktop table, must have, save a lot of spaces
customer_reviews.author: phamp2

customer_reviews.title: Out of the way and great.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this desk in my bedroom. Out of the way and great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice when put together. Easy build, but it's particle board so not very strong. It serves its purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and service!
customer_reviews.text: The desk is very high quality and easy to put together. This is the best investment for someone looking for a space saving option for their home or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard tray screws aren't good.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard tray screws would not hold the tracks on. They stripped immediately. I used some glue and had to try some screws I had which I ended up breaking the board. I managed to get it usable but the wood it broken through. Just looks like crud.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Will only mount on wooden studs!
customer_reviews.text: This is great idea. Saves lots of floor space. However, it should be noted that it can only hang on walls that have wooden studs. This information does not appear in the product description anywhere. Metal wall studs are simply not strong enough to hold this unit. When you look at the video, one of the first things they say is "wood studs only". So, after carrying it up a flight of stairs and unpacking it, I had to put it back in the box to get ready to ship it back. Amazon wanted to charge me $35 for this but after I spoke to a customer service supervisor and explained the issue, they made a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 42.25 inches NOT 41 inches.  Big difference!
customer_reviews.text: Longer than specified. Didn't fit in the spot I wanted. Had to totally rearrange my office. Not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if there were holes on the back of the shelfs for wires and cables to run through
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Stupid floating desk
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worse products that I ever bought on amazon, DO NOT BUY IT, board D11 was missing, screws never came with it ... just an awful product ... I'm throwing this stupid thing in the garbage and I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Rock

product_meta.title: Prepac Storage and Keyboard Tray Floating Desk, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoWith its distinctive asymmetrical design, The floating desk with shelves is the perfect solution to all your space saving NEEDS without compromising on style. This item mounts directly to the wall with prepacks innovative metal rail hanging system, allowing it to “float” conveniently off the floor and out of the way. The top shelf and spacious side compartments provide the perfect place to keep anything you may need close at hand. Hidden wire management is integrated into the design of the desk, keeping cables and wires out of sight and out of mind. The Roll-Out keyboard tray conveniently glides on metal rails for easy access. This sturdy yet lightweight desk is a unique addition to any office, bedroom and living room or anywhere you need the space.
feature_bullets: Mounts easily at any Height with prepacks innovative metal rail hanging system
Spacious side compartment with 2 adjustable shelves is perfect for binders, textbooks or speakers
Hidden wire management keeps your workspace streamlined and clutter free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
